result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

02:01 PM 22CF115/22CF116 - Defendant Allen L. Gholson Jr. in court, in custody.  Attorney Harper appears on behalf  Amy Elizabeth Forehand in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney Mays waives the hearing the preliminary hearing on both cases. Court goes over the waiver and binds over for trial.
Arraignment scheduled for October 26, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

12:01 PM AIA in 22CF115 and 22CF116. Defendant Allen L. Gholson Jr. in court, in custody, with Atty. Stephen Mays appearing for this hearing only (not formally retained yet). DA Harper appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Defense waives formal reading of the complaints. Court states the charges and informs Def of the possible max. penalties as well as his rights including right to prelim. Def stood mute for entry of NG pleas to the misdemeanor charges and waives the 10-day time limits for the scheduling of the prelim for the felony charges. Prelim set.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 12, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on October 12, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

11:31 AM Defendant Allen L. Gholson Jr. appeared by video.  Attorney Amy Elizabeth Forehand appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Mark Frank appears by video and hasn't received the criminal complaint. Attorney Frank states that AG hasn't called the public defender yet so that Attorney Frank can be appointed. Max penalties stated for 22CF115 and 22CF116.

Attorney Forehand asks for $2,500 cash bond in both cases. No contact with KB or DL. No contact with the victim JW.
Attorney Frank speaks about AG background and asks for a signature bond.
CC Angel orders $2,500 cash bond in each case and conditions in:
22CF115 No contact with JW
22CF116 No contact with Kiefer Beran or Dakota Lins.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on August 31, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
